page.title: 12BLENHEIM SCHOOL, ORPINGTON
page.content: {Blenheim Junior school} was opened in 1967. Our pool was opened in 1969 and was covered in 1971. Altogether it cost over five and a half thousand pounds. We share it with {Goddington School} because they helped us to raise some of the money. When the oldest children in the school frst started going to Snowdon they paid thirty-five pounds. Blenheim started going to Snowdon in 1973,for a week in every summer. In 1981 the new library was opened in a spare classroom. In 1982 we started using computers. We have always had a sports day and Green team have won it most times. Blenheim's best football season was in 1975 to 1976. Our headmaster designed our school badge and uniform.
